data.message: Alex Zamora these comments are hilarious! "Em is soft" "50 cent beefed with ja rule and Em jumped in". "Why does he not jump in to help Joe?" The reason Em jumped in with ja rule and murder inc was because they spoke about Hailie.

replies.message: Yeah there's no beef here.Hot 97 wants to make something out of nothing. And all the Drake haters are hoping someone ends his career like Ja Rule. 😂😂 He's not going anywhere. Guy can easily make a 2 disc greatest hits and he's not even finished.
